item.title: 美国股市下跌，因PPI超预期上涨导致创纪录的上涨势头戛然而止
item.description: 美国股市周四下跌，原因是批发通胀率创下三年来最大增幅，阻止了帮助美国股市创下历史新高的风险反弹。【原文：US stocks fell on Thursday as wholesale inflation accelerated by the most in three years, halting a risk-on rally that helped set fresh record highs.】

item.title: 部长考虑各种税收计划，波兰银行业绩下滑
item.description: 在波兰财政部表示正在考虑对银行业征收新税的 "各种方案 "之后，波兰银行业的增长正面临近四个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Revved-up Polish banks are heading for their biggest decline in almost four months after the Finance Ministry said it’s considering “various scenarios” for new levies on the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大最大养老金收益率为 1%，美元疲软打击收益
item.description: 由于美元疲软在很大程度上抵消了股票和能源资产的收益，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）上季度的回报率为 1%。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board returned 1% last quarter as the weak US dollar largely offset gains in stocks and energy assets.】

item.title: OpenText 最大的投资者支持董事会解雇首席执行官的决定
item.description: 新斯科舍银行子公司 Jarislowsky Fraser Ltd.表示，支持软件公司 Open Text Corp. 董事会罢免长期首席执行官 Mark Barrenechea 的决定。【原文：Jarislowsky Fraser Ltd., a Bank of Nova Scotia subsidiary, says it supports software company Open Text Corp.’s board of directors in its decision to oust long-time Chief Executive Officer Mark Barrenechea.】

item.title: 印度称尽管特朗普征收 50%关税，但与美国的防务关系保持不变
item.description: 印度与华盛顿的防务关系仍在按部就班地进行，美国代表团将于本月访问新德里，尽管这个南亚国家正在努力应对唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的50%关税。【原文：India’s defense ties with Washington remain on track with a US delegation set to visit New Delhi this month, even as the South Asian nation grapples with President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs.】

item.title: 苹果手表血氧追踪器在胜诉后重返美国市场
item.description: 经过长达数年的法律诉讼，苹果公司智能手表的血氧追踪功能将重返美国市场。【原文：Apple Inc.’s blood oxygen tracking feature for its smartwatch is returning to the US after a yearslong legal fight.】

item.title: 油砂生产商通过减少维护提高产量
item.description: 加拿大油砂公司已经找到了在油价低迷的情况下提高产量的方法：减少设备的长时间维修。【原文：Canadian oil sands companies have found a way to ramp up production in the face of oil prices: curtailing lengthy repairs to equipment.】

item.title: Airbnb 让美国客人推迟到入住前付款
item.description: Airbnb Inc.正在让美国的客人预订一些旅行而无需预付费用，以争取那些不愿意提前预订的有预算意识的旅行者。【原文：Airbnb Inc. is letting guests in the US reserve some trips without paying upfront, an effort to win over budget-conscious travelers who may be reluctant to book in advance.】

item.title: BGN 为日内瓦和迪拜办事处招揽更多交易人才
item.description: 能源和大宗商品交易商 BGN 在去年招聘人才的基础上，又从贡渥集团（Gunvor Group Ltd.）和利塔斯科公司（Litasco SA）招聘了经验丰富的员工，以加强其团队。【原文：Energy and commodities trader BGN is strengthening its team with experienced hires from Gunvor Group Ltd. and Litasco SA, building on last year’s recruitment of talent.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料油出口在无人机空袭中创下战时新高
item.description: 尽管乌克兰加强了对俄罗斯炼油厂的无人机袭击，但俄罗斯的石油产品出口在 8 月初仍有所增加，其中燃料油出口量激增，达到战争开始以来的最高水平。【原文：Russia’s petroleum product exports increased in early August despite intensified Ukrainian drone strikes on the country’s refineries, led by a surge in fuel oil shipments to the highest level since the start of the war.】

item.title: 马斯克的星链公司接近与沙特阿拉伯国旗航空公司达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的国旗航空公司正在与 SpaceX 公司就安装 Starlink 互联网服务进行深入讨论，此举将扩大埃隆-马斯克在竞争激烈的机载 Wifi 市场上的业务范围。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s flag carrier airline is in advanced discussions with SpaceX to install the Starlink internet service, in a move that would expand Elon Musk’s footprint in a highly competitive market for onboard wifi, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，交易员在 PPI 之后减少对美联储降息的押注
item.description: 在生产层面的通胀数据强于预期，促使交易商减少对美联储下月降息的押注之后，国债走低。【原文：Treasuries moved lower after a reading of inflation at the production level came in stronger than expected, prompting traders to pare bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 长江和记排除今年完成港口交易的可能性
item.description: 长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）排除了将其全球港口出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. ruled out the likelihood of the controversial sale of its global ports to a BlackRock Inc.-backed consortium being completed this year but stayed optimistic about the deal’s prospects after inviting a Chinese investor into the mix.】

item.title: 美国服务业生产者价格创三年来最大涨幅
item.description: 受利润率飙升的推动，7 月份美国批发通胀率创下三年来最大增幅，这表明企业并未消化与关税相关的更高进口成本。【原文：US wholesale inflation accelerated in July by the most in three years, boosted by a surge in margins that indicates companies are not absorbing higher import costs related to tariffs.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数走低，续请失业救济人数继续上升
item.description: 上周美国失业救济金申请人数有所减少，表明雇主仍不愿裁员。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits edged lower last week, suggesting employers remain reluctant to lay off workers.】

item.title: 贝森特说他不是在推动美联储减息，只是在强调模式
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他并没有要求美联储进行一系列降息，只是指出，模型显示 "中性 "利率应降低约 1.5 个百分点。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he isn’t calling for a series of interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve, just pointing out that models suggest a “neutral” rate would be about 1.5 percentage points lower.】

item.title: 准备金激增 64% 后 Klarna 季度净亏损扩大
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 不得不在第二季度为可能变质的贷款预留更多资金，此举在该公司预计上市前给利润带来了压力。【原文：Klarna Group Plc had to set aside more money for potentially souring loans in the second quarter, a move that put pressure on profits ahead of its expected public debut.】

item.title: 丹-勒布赢得将英国投资信托基金变为再保险公司的投票
item.description: 丹-勒布（Dan Loeb）不顾部分股东的强烈反对，赢得了将其英国投资信托基金转变为人寿和年金再保险公司的投票。【原文：Dan Loeb has won a vote to turn his UK investment trust into a life and annuity reinsurance company, defying a fierce backlash from some shareholders.】

item.title: 以色列准备在约旦河西岸扩张以 "埋葬 "巴勒斯坦国
item.description: 以色列计划将定居点扩大到西岸的一个地区，这将有效地将飞地一分为二；以色列财政部长说，此举 "埋葬了巴勒斯坦国的想法"。【原文：Israel plans to expand settlements into an area of the West Bank that would effectively bisect the enclave — a move its finance minister said “buries the idea of a Palestinian state.”】

item.title: 在伦敦交易的私募股权基金暗藏 401（k）风险
item.description: 私募股权投资越来越接近于进入 401（k）账户，但该资产类别的零售投资将如何发展，目前还没有清晰的图景。阿波罗（Apollo）、黑石（Blackstone）、KKR — 等大型上市私募股权投资公司讲述了一个故事，但在它们的案例中，讲述的是管理基金的业务，而不是基金的实际回报。【原文：Private equity is moving closer to gaining entry into 401(k) accounts, but there’s no clear picture of how retail investments in the asset class will fare. The big publicly listed names — Apollo, Blackstone, KKR — tell one story, but in their case, it’s about the business of managing funds, not the actual returns inside them.】

item.title: 非洲顶级基金经理认为私人资本可弥补资金缺口
item.description: 非洲最大的资金管理公司认为，私人资本是缩小非洲大陆每年 1,000 亿美元基础设施资金缺口的关键，而这对促进经济增长和帮助数百万人摆脱贫困至关重要。【原文：Africa’s largest money manager sees private capital as key to narrowing the continent’s $100 billion annual infrastructure-financing gap, critical to boosting economic growth and lifting millions out of poverty.】

item.title: 南非将于 2026 年设立基础设施信贷担保机构
item.description: 南非财政部副部长表示，南非政府打算在 2026 年 7 月设立一项信贷担保计划，以支持私营公司对基础设施的投资。【原文：South Africa’s government intends to establish a credit-guarantee initiative in July 2026 to support investments in infrastructure by private companies, the nation’s deputy finance minister said.】

item.title: Vibe Coding 初创公司 Lovable 希望明年年销售额达到 10 亿美元
item.description: 瑞典人工智能初创公司 Lovable 今年 7 月自称是全球 "发展最快的初创公司"，引起了巨大轰动。该公司首席执行官表示，这种增长势头不会停止。【原文：Lovable, a Swedish artificial intelligence startup, made a big splash in July when it called itself the “fastest-growing startup” in the world. Its chief executive says that isn’t stopping.】

item.title: WoodMac 称美国变压器短缺将阻碍电网扩张
item.description: 据能源咨询公司伍德麦肯兹（Wood Mackenzie）称，变压器是在电网中输送更多能源所必需的部件，其日益短缺将阻碍满足美国电力需求的能力。【原文：The ability to satisfy booming US demand for electricity will be hampered by a growing shortage of transformers, components that are necessary to deliver more energy across the grid, according to energy consulting firm Wood Mackenzie.】

item.title: 受欧盟制裁的纳亚拉公司正与印度商谈维持炼油厂运营事宜
item.description: 俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）支持的纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）周四在一份声明中说，该炼油厂正在与印度政府和贸易伙伴进行谈判，以在欧盟制裁影响供应链的情况下保持其炼油厂的运营稳定性。【原文：Rosneft-backed Nayara Energy Ltd. is in talks with the Indian government and trade partners to preserve the operational stability of its refinery even as EU sanctions affect supply-chains, the refiner said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 季风降雨为印度水坝补水，冬季作物前景看好
item.description: 印度充沛的季风降雨帮助补充了主要水库的水量，改善了主要依靠水坝和地下水灌溉的小麦和油菜籽等冬播作物的前景。【原文：Ample monsoon rainfall in India has helped replenish water in key reservoirs, improving prospects for winter-sown crops such as wheat and rapeseed that mostly rely on dams and groundwater for irrigation.】

item.title: 巴西历时八年的绿色航空燃料运动遭遇特朗普阻挠
item.description:
美国决定限制税收减免并征收 50%的关税，这限制了最大航空市场的准入。【原文：

US decisions to limit a tax credit and impose 50% tariffs are curbing access to the largest aviation market.

】

item.title: S&P 评级上调为印度债券带来亟需的宽慰
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）在印度债券市场的关键时刻上调了印度的信用评级，在全球不确定性和日益加剧的财政压力下提供了潜在的宽慰。【原文：S&P Global Ratings’ upgrade of India’s credit rating comes at a crucial moment for the bond market, offering potential relief amid global uncertainty and mounting fiscal pressures.】

item.title: 玉米下跌，交易商继续关注美国农业部对作物产量的高估
item.description: 本周早些时候，美国农业部将国内产量预期上调至历史最高水平，芝加哥玉米期货下跌，回到近一年来的最低点附近。【原文：Chicago corn futures declined, returning near their lowest in almost a year, after the US Department of Agriculture raised its domestic production forecast to an all-time high earlier this week.】

item.title: 英伟达的特朗普税令投资者对人工智能财富并不担心
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）在中国销售的某些半导体产品征收 15% 销售税的举动，丝毫没有影响投资者对这家全球最有价值公司的热情。【原文：President Donald Trump’s move to extract a 15% sales tax from Nvidia Corp. on certain semiconductors sold in China did nothing to damp investor enthusiasm for the world’s most valuable company.】
